text: O prophet ni far lawful vi your wives al whom vi pag their due dowry ki vi jam as granted vi DI! Ankaux lawful por vi en marriage est daughters your patr frat daughters your patr sisters daughters your mother's frat daughters your mother's sisters emigrated vi. Ankaux se kred woman don prophet - Per forfeiting dowry! - prophet marry her dowry li tial wishes Tamen sxi forfeiting de dowry aplik nur al prophet ne al ali believers. Ni jam dekret their dekstr en regard their spouses ki ili jam hav. This est sxpar vi any embaras. DI est Forgiver Merciful
